sentences.en: Actuals available for delivery are traded for cash on a spot or forward basis.
sentences.cn: 可供交割的现货可在即期或远期基础上换成现金.

sentences.en: Do you want to synch to protected actuals?
sentences.cn: 是否需要同步受保护的实际值?

sentences.en: Mobile phone operators had expected monthly usage of up to 250 minutes. Actuals are very different, at 100 minutes.
sentences.cn: 移动电话运营商原本预期每月用量可达250分钟，但实际数据大相径庭，只有100分钟。

sentences.en: Notifies the project manager of any changes you made to the actuals.
sentences.cn: 通知项目经理您对实际值所做的任何更改.

sentences.en: Provide Project Head and BG Financial Management with monthly reporting, actuals VS budget for project expenses.
sentences.cn: 为项目负责人及总部财务提供每月项目支出与预算的对比报表.

sentences.en: The company trades in both actuals and futures in grain.
sentences.cn: 该公司在粮食贸易中既有现金交易也有期货交易.

trans.tran_en: numbers that relate to something that has actually happened, rather than what was expected to happen
